channel.title: Plugins on Alex Pliutau
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Alex Pliutau

item.title: How to build Go plugin with data inside
item.description: Go 1.8 gives us a new tool for creating shared libraries, called plugins! This new plugin buildmode is currently only supported on Linux. But what if we build plugin with data in binary format inside? So we can ship only one .so file. I tried with go-bindata tool. Plugin to find a city by http.Request It’s for experimental usage only! This project contains an example with Go plugin which contains free GeoLite2 MaxMind’s database of ip addresses.
